:::: {.content-visible unless-format="revealjs"}
1. While editing a template outline,^[[Edit template outlines](/guide/templates/customize-document-templates.qmd#edit-template-outlines)] click **{{< fa plus >}}** on any section of a template that does not have child sections.

1. Select **{{< fa align-left >}} Text Block**.

1. In the modal that opens, select the reusable blocks you want to add.

1. Click **Insert # Text Block(s) to Document**.

1. Finish editing your template, then save a new version.

::::



:::: {.content-hidden unless-format="revealjs"}
Share library blocks can be added to templates:

1. [While editing a template outline](/guide/templates/customize-document-templates.qmd#edit-template-outlines){target="_blank"}, click **{{< fa plus >}}** on any section of a template that does not have child sections.

1. Select **{{< fa align-left >}} Text Block**.

1. In the modal that opens, select the reusable blocks you want to add.

1. Click **Insert # Text Block(s) to Document**.

1. Finish editing your template, then save a new version.

::::
